title: 1.CSY.1
text: The student will describe how computing components work together to create a computing system.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Identify and define hardware, software, and computing systems.
Identify common components of computing systems in different types of computing devices.
Describe how hardware and software work together to form a computing system.

title: 1.CSY.2
text: The student will use accurate terminology to describe when a computing system might not work as expected.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Identify and describe a problem with a device or computing system when it does not work as expected.
Propose a solution to simple hardware or software issues
